name: 2024 the 5th International Conference on Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning
content: Paper Publication: 1\. PRML 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. 2\. Journal of Advances in Information Technology (ISSN: 1798-2340; Impact Factor 2022: 1.0, CiteScore: 3.1): indexed by ESCI (Web of Science), Scopus, EBSCO, Google Scholar, CNKI, Crossref, etc.
